old:
島の調査に赴いていた覚者が新たな難敵に遭遇した
ようだ。何か良くないことの前触れなのだろうか。い
や、おそらく、その通りなのだろう

　フィンダムに乗り込んで、侵食の元凶を見つけ出し
て排除すべしという声は以前からあったが、実現に向
けて動き出す時が来たようだ

　追記：白竜、そしてわたしの直轄である特命部隊の
人選を悪し様に言う者は少なくなかった。しかし、そ
の者たちは今回のガルドリンの英雄的な行動をどう考
えるのだろう。エリオットの義理に篤い言動をどう考
えるのだろうか
new:
The Arisen who was investigating the island seems to have encountered a new formidable enemy. Is this perhaps a sign of something unfavorable? No, it is quite likely that's the case.

The voice calling to board Phindym and locate and eliminate the source of corruption has been there for a while, but it seems that the time to take action has come.

Additional note: There were many who criticized the selection of the White Dragon and the special task force under my direct control. However, I wonder how those individuals perceive Gurdolin's heroic actions this time? How do they regard Elliot's sincere words and behaviors?
